content: Combat sport events in 2023 ***ONE Fight Night 8: Superlek vs. Williams*** was a [combat sport](/wiki/Combat_sport) event produced by [ONE Championship](/wiki/ONE_Championship) that took place on March 25, 2023, at the [Singapore Indoor Stadium](/wiki/Singapore_Indoor_Stadium) in [Kallang](/wiki/Kallang), Singapore. ## Background A [ONE Heavyweight World Championship](/wiki/List_of_ONE_Championship_champions#Heavyweight_World_Championship) title unification bout between current champion [Arjan Bhullar](/wiki/Arjan_Bhullar) and interim champion [Anatoly Malykhin](/wiki/Anatoly_Malykhin) (also current [ONE Light Heavyweight World Champion](/wiki/List_of_ONE_Championship_champions#Light_Heavyweight_World_Championship)) was expected to headline the event. The pairing was previously scheduled to headline at [ONE 161](/wiki/ONE_161), but Bhullar withdraw due to suffering an injury in training and it was announced that Bhullar had surgery on the arm two weeks ago. However, the bout was removed from the event due to a shift in broadcaster commitments. A [ONE Flyweight Kickboxing World Championship](/wiki/ONE_Flyweight_Kickboxing_World_Championship) bout between current champion [Superlek Kiatmuu9](/wiki/Superlek_Kiatmuu9) and current [ONE Flyweight Muay Thai Champion](/wiki/ONE_Flyweight_Muay_Thai_World_Championship), #1 ranking contender [Rodtang Jitmuangnon](/wiki/Rodtang_Jitmuangnon) was promoted to the new main event. However, Rodtang withdraw from the bout due to injury and was replaced by [Danial Williams](/wiki/Danial_Williams). Williams was scheduled to fight Rui Botelho and was replaced by [Aslanbek Zikreev](/wiki/Aslanbek_Zikreev) at a catchweight of 127 pounds. A [ONE Women's Atomweight Muay Thai World Championship](/wiki/ONE_Women%27s_Atomweight_Muay_Thai_World_Championship) title unification bout between current champion [Allycia Rodrigues](/wiki/Allycia_Rodrigues) and interim champion [Janet Todd](/wiki/Janet_Todd_(kickboxer)) (also current [ONE Women's Atomweight Kickboxing World Champion](/wiki/List_of_ONE_Championship_champions#Light_Heavyweight_World_Championship)) took place at the event. The pairing was previously scheduled to meet at [ONE on Prime Video 5](/wiki/ONE_on_Prime_Video_5), but Todd pulled out from the event due to tests positive for [COVID-19](/wiki/COVID-19). A women's atomweight bout between [Itsuki Hirata](/wiki/Itsuki_Hirata) and former [Rizin Women's Super Atomweight Champion](/wiki/Rizin_Fighting_Federation#Women's_Super_Atomweight_Championship) [Seo Hee Ham](/wiki/Seo_Hee_Ham) took place at the event. The pairing was previously scheduled to meet at [ONE 163](/wiki/ONE_163), but the bout was scrapped for Hirata failed weight and hydration. Reigning flyweight submission grappling champion [Mikey Musumeci](/wiki/Mikey_Musumeci)'s sister [Tammi Musumeci](/wiki/Tammi_Musumeci) was booked to make her promotional debut at the event, taking on [Bianca Basilio](/wiki/Bianca_Bas%C3%ADlio) in a strawweight bout. At the weigh-ins, Eddie Abasolo weighed in at 158.8 pounds, 3.8 pounds over the featherweight limit. The bout proceeded at catchweight with Abasolo was fined their purse of his purse, which went to his opponent [Niclas Larsen](/wiki/Niclas_Larsen). ## Results Main card (Amazon Prime Video)Weight classMethodRoundTimeNotesFlyweight Kickboxing[Superlek Kiatmuu9](/wiki/Superlek_Kiatmuu9) (c)def.[Danial Williams](/wiki/Danial_Williams)KO (punches)31:55[a]Women's Atomweight Muay Thai[Allycia Rodrigues](/wiki/Allycia_Rodrigues) (c)def.[Janet Todd](/wiki/Janet_Todd_(kickboxer)) (ic)Decision (unanimous)53:00[b]Women's Atomweight[Ham Seo-hee](/wiki/Seo_Hee_Ham)def.[Itsuki Hirata](/wiki/Itsuki_Hirata)Decision (unanimous)35:00FeatherweightAkbar Abdullaevdef.Oh Ho-taekTKO (punches)10:44Strawweight Kickboxing[Zhang Peimian](/wiki/Zhang_Peimian)def.Torepchi DongakDecision (unanimous)33:00Catchweight (128 lbs) Muay Thai[Aslanbek Zikreev](/wiki/Aslanbek_Zikreev)def.Rui BotelhoDecision (split)33:00Strawweight[Keito Yamakita](/wiki/Keito_Yamakita)def.[Alex Silva](/wiki/Alex_Silva_(fighter))Decision (unanimous)35:00Preliminary card (YouTube / Watch ONE)Catchweight (158.8 lbs) Muay ThaiEddie Abasolodef.[Niclas Larsen](/wiki/Niclas_Larsen)KO (punch)22:14[c]Women's Strawweight Muay Thai[Iman Barlow](/wiki/Iman_Barlow)def.[Ekaterina Vandaryeva](/wiki/Ekaterina_Vandaryeva)Decision (unanimous)33:00Women's Strawweight Submission Grappling[Tammi Musumeci](/wiki/Tammi_Musumeci)def.[Bianca Bas√≠lio](/wiki/Bianca_Bas%C3%ADlio)Decision (unanimous)110:00 ## Bonus awards The following fighters received $50,000 bonuses. - **Performance of the Night: Superlek Kiatmuu9, Akbar Abdullaev** and **Zhang Peimian** - Martial Arts portal - [2023 in ONE Championship](/wiki/2023_in_ONE_Championship) - [List of ONE Championship events](/wiki/List_of_ONE_Championship_events) - [List of current ONE fighters](/wiki/List_of_current_ONE_fighters)
title: ONE Fight Night 8
